snippet: These charts indicate how difficult a fantasy matchup a player will have depending on how many standard fantasy points the opposing defense has allowed to his position.

byline.original: By JASON SABLICH and JUSTIN SABLICH

lead_paragraph: These charts indicate how difficult a fantasy matchup a player will have depending on how many standard fantasy points the opposing defense has allowed to his position.

headline.main: Fantasy Football: Introducing Weekly Matchup Analysis Charts
